long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FreshTAB is a simple extension to create a small calming feeling from the daily usage of the workflow when you open a new tab.
We share random fun and entertaining videos or images on the tab including the Time, Date your battery and whether the device is charging.
The point of FreshTAB will be to calm down the users for a couple of seconds before they search for their next adventure.
